```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
# Read the CSV files
df_total <- read.csv("/Users/gabecowley/Documents/2023SummerResearch/02_Preprocessing/02c_tables/04_product/countComparison.csv")
```

```{r}
filtered_data <- df_total[(df_total$trivyCount != df_total$grypeCount), ]
```

```{r}
view(filtered_data)
```

```{r}
# Specify the directory path
directory_path <- "/Users/gabecowley/Documents/2023SummerResearch/02_Preprocessing/02c_tables/04_product/"

output_name <- "countComparison_differences.csv"

# Specify the file path along with the directory path
file_path <- paste0(directory_path, output_name)

# Save the data frame as a CSV file
write.csv(filtered_data, file = file_path, row.names = FALSE)
```
